price: 73. Ils y trouvent diverses utilités et en obtiennent des boissons. Ne seront-ils reconnaissants ?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
